Client Groups

# Seniors and Road Safety

If you are 65 or older, you a part of a group that makes up 22% of Québec driver's licence holders. Even if you have been driving for several years, these pages will provide you with lots of practical information and answers to your questions.

Last update: May 19, 2022

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That’s why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent. By continuing to browse without modifying your preferences, you accept the use of cookies.
